name: VITESSENCE® TEX Crumbles 1651 - 70000698
description: VITESSENCE® TEX Crumbles 1651 - 70000698 is a plant-based textured protein crumble made from pea protein. Produced through extrusion, it offers a crumbly texture that is ideal for a variety of food applications. This ingredient is derived from plant sources, making it suitable for plant-based and vegan products. It carries multiple labeling claims, including being halal, plant-based, non-GMO, kosher, gluten-free, and naturally derived. Additionally, it meets various certifications and compliance standards, such as Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS) status, Kosher certification, Non-GMO Project verification, FDA approval, and Halal certification, ensuring its safety and quality for use in food products.
